name: pocketbase
description: PocketBase is a backend-as-a-service in a single executable. It offers database, auth, file storage, and real-time API, ideal for building self-hosted app backends quickly.
features: Single executable: Deploy entire backend in one file without external dependencies or complex setup.
Built-in database: SQLite database included with admin UI for managing collections and records.
Authentication: User authentication with email/password, OAuth2, and custom auth providers.
File storage: Upload and serve files with automatic thumbnail generation and access control.
Real-time API: Subscribe to database changes with WebSocket connections for live updates.
REST API: Automatically generated REST API for all database collections with filtering and sorting.
Admin dashboard: Manage database schema, users, and settings through a web-based admin panel.
Access rules: Define granular access control rules using JavaScript expressions for security.
Hooks and events: Extend functionality with custom hooks that run before or after database operations.
Email templates: Customize email templates for verification, password reset, and notifications.
Backup and export: Export database and files for backup or migration to other instances.
JavaScript SDK: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for easy integration with frontend applications.
